data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed the Investor Update on the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2021.

Kindly take the aforesaid on record.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed the disclosure of Related Party Transactions on a consolidated basis for the period from October 1, 2020 to March 31, 2021 in the format specified in the relevant accounting standards.

You are requested to take the same on your record.
